_header: When the eye begins to turn

BLAru507.Transcription:
When þe hee beginns til tarne& þe fote beginnis to
                    spurne& þe bak makes þe boweÞer by þu see
                    soneÞat he sall go to þe dome

Horstmann,  Carl,
                        ed.  
             Yorkshire Writers.
         2 vols. London, Sonnenschein; New York: Macmillan, 1895-96: 1.156.
Woolf,  Rosemary. 
             The English Religious Lyric in the Middle Ages.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1968: 81.
